Datatable:
+10 [industryColored] per Anomaly on System
Ancient Knowledge Your civilization has already explored the galaxy, now all that is left is to take it. Reveals all Solar Systems in the Galaxy
Well Founded Your civilization has already expended the resources to explore their constellation, but now they can finally explore it. Reveals all Nodes in Starting Constellation
Lost Refuge With an extragalactic knowledge of where all the true landmarks of the galaxy are, finding a place to hide or escape to has never been easier. Reveals all Special Nodes in the Galaxy
Predator Nature instincts make it easy to determine roughly where your prey lay. Reveals all the location of all Home Systems in the Galaxy
May not build Colony Ships May not occupy Conquered Territory
State Administration As a result of its history of decentralized government, this faction is incapable of enforcing much in the way of empire-wide legislation.
Core Administration This faction strives for centralized government and can more easily maintain empire-wide legislation.
Cheats Displays traits that have game-breaking effects #FF0000#+10 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+50 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+100 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+500 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+1000 Points#REVERT# Someone is a big cheater!
Generate at least $ScienceAmoutName Science for $TurnsAmoutName Turns through any means You can find new Relics or remove Relics from Heroes to increase your Science production, as well as build improvements or enter science agreements with other factions Planets do not generate Science. Cannot obtain Technology from other empires. Temple in the Empire -50% [FIDS] on Planet +10 [prestigeColored] per [population] +5 [prestigeColored] per [population] on Cold +1 Population Slot +4 [scienceColored] per [relic] +1 [scienceColored] per [relic] per Fertile
Leveraged Buyouts Provides buyout cost reduction of 10% Speculative Finance Provides buyout cost reduction of 20% Efficient Contracting Provides buyout cost reduction of 10% Efficient Contracting Provides buyout cost reduction of 10%
Accelerated Colonization +10 [foodColored] on systems (colonies and outposts) Production Quotas +15 [industryColored] on systems (colonies and outposts) Second Generation Finance New methods of calculating return on investment based on the limitless potential of the future in space allows loans to be far easier to acquire for the population, and as such, reaping the benefits of your investments faster. Creative Naming Pro-tip, don't make names about your lack of creativity. Good Singers It may seem stupid, but having some of the best singers in the galaxy certainly helps your empires influence Cheap ACP Systems Just like it's big brother in Tier 2 Science and Discovery, it allows better temperature regulation, but is also far cheaper, albeit not as efficient. Self Sustaining Homes Cities, Homes, or simply Houses that manage to grow their own food will be able to enjoy increased growth rates, especially on highly populated areas where land is much rarer but sprinkling with skyscrapers. Auto Regulated Shifts With information more available than ever, including about the population's habits or mood, it is much easier to plan the ideal duration of work depending on many conditions for each and every citizen. For example, sick workers won't work as much as they usually do resulting in faster recovery rates and being able to work fully again faster than before. N+1 Generation Finance Other, newer methods of calculating return on investment based on the limitless potential of the future in space allows loans to be far easier to acquire for the population, and as such, reaping the benefits of your investments faster Creative Problem Solving Solving problems is one thing but being able to have an intuition as to how to solve other -related or not- problems, or simply knowing that a given solution might result in other problems is not a given. But recent advances in AI showed that the world is more interconnected than we thought, and every kind of science is now much closer to each other than before. Improved Bureaucracy Another thing that seems really silly to anyone working in paperwork, but what if it was properly organized and required less than 10 seconds each time you wanted to find any kind of document ? Portable ACP Systems What if YOU wanted to live on a barren planet but the conditions were too harsh for your liking? Well not anymore, with the new Portable ACP systems, the temperature around your body suit is automatically adjusted thanks to a mini portable atmosphere ! Even the coldest of places becomes just as you want it !
+10 [manpower] on Systems (Vanilla) +15 [manpower] on Systems (Rework) +15 [systemdefense] on Systems (Rework) +400 [systemdefense] Capacity on Systems (Rework)
+40 [systemdefense] Capacity per [population] on Systems (Rework) +3 [manpower] per [population] on Systems (Rework)
+5% [manpower] per System Level on Systems (Vanilla) +40% x GameSpeed [manpower] per System Level on Systems (Rework)
Greener Pastures Your empire knows how to make it's cities look beautiful, and, alongside a good handling of tourism, many tourists end up settling in a more permanent fashion.
Ship Design Rewards Enabling this will allow you to unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. True You will unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. False You won't unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. Enable Law Rework Enabling this will use the ESG reworked laws True Uses ESG expanded and rebalanced laws False Uses vanilla laws
By applying governmental pressure to banks and cleverly manipulating interest rates, key actors are able to influence the global inflation rate of the empire, at least for a time. This requires significant political influence, obviously, as the Families have a tight grip on these matters. [Note: Inflation cannot be reduced below 1.0x]
Stealth Surveillance Through extensive practice playing hide-and-seek, the empire's scouts have learned how to be stealthy while conducting reconnaissance
--> Poacher Your empire has a.. gift for knowing where feeble empires are located, but who knows you'll do with this information. Reveals all Minor Factions in the Galaxy
All the [industryColored] is consumed. 75% [industryColored] converted into [dustColored] All the [industryColored] is consumed. 100% [industryColored] converted into [dustColored] All the [industryColored] is consumed. 50% [industryColored] converted into [dustColored] All the [industryColored] is consumed. 100% [industryColored] converted into [scienceColored] All the [industryColored] is consumed. 75% [industryColored] converted into [scienceColored] All the [industryColored] is consumed. 50% [industryColored] converted into [scienceColored]
Natural Camouflage This ship can innately cloak its entire fleet at Cloak Level 1 without any additional modules. +10% Ship Health, +10% Shield Capacity, and +10% Defense on Plating and Shields
This ship cannot be retrofitted
An AI that allows you to play freely. Human Players get: • +2 [fidsiColored] per [population] • +20 [happinessColored] on Systems • +2 Overcolonization Threshold • -20% Overpopulation [happinessColored] penalties • -20% [dustColored] upkeep • +10% [hackingSpeed] • +40 [processingPower] It's like you have guns, and they have sticks. Human Players get: • +1 [fidsiColored] per [population] • +10 [happinessColored] on Systems • +1 Overcolonization Threshold • -10% Overpopulation [happinessColored] penalties • -10% [dustColored] upkeep • +5% [hackingSpeed] • +20 [processingPower] It’s like you have guns, and they have guns. Neither the AI nor Human players get any bonuses. It’s like you have guns, and they have better guns. AI Players get: • +1 [fidsiColored] and +1 an additional [prestigeColored] per [population] • +20 [happinessColored] on Systems • -10% Overcolonization [happinessColored] penalties • -10% Overpopulation [happinessColored] penalties • -10% [dustColored] upkeep • +1 Maximum Behemoth • +10 [processingPower] • -50% Treaty [prestigeColored] upkeep It’s like you have guns, and they have tanks. AI Players get: • +2 [fidsiColored] and an additional +1.5 [prestigeColored] per [population] • +20 [happinessColored] on Systems • -20% Overcolonization [happinessColored] penalties • -20% Overpopulation [happinessColored] penalties • -20% [dustColored] upkeep • +2 Maximum Behemoths • +20 [processingPower] • -50% Treaty [prestigeColored] upkeep It’s like you have guns, and they have nuclear weapons systems that can track your biometrics. AI Players get: • +3 [fidsiColored] and an additional +1.5 [prestigeColored] per [population] • +40 [happinessColored] on Systems • -40% Overcolonization [happinessColored] penalties • -40% Overpopulation [happinessColored] penalties • -40% [dustColored] upkeep • +3 Maximum Behemoths • +30 [processingPower] • -50% Treaty [prestigeColored] upkeep You shall not pass! AI Players get: • +4 [fidsiColored] and an additional +1.5 [prestigeColored] per [population] • +60 [happinessColored] on Systems • -60% Overcolonization [happinessColored] penalties • -60% Overpopulation [happinessColored] penalties • -60% [dustColored] upkeep • +4 Maximum Behemoths • 40 [processingPower] • -50% Treaty [prestigeColored] upkeep • x2 [systemdefense] Capacity

YIMBY! Preemption of Local Zoning and Building Code Restrictions By overruling obstructionist NIMBY policies of local governments, imperial authorities are able to accelerate development with significantly fewer resources
PROBE DEEP PROBE DEEP and HARD Prophylactic Reconnaissance Observing Biological Entities: Deploying Extraterrestrial Exploration Probes and Harvesting All Relevant Data
One Small Step Population Gratification Through Display of Exploratory Successes By broadly circulating stories documenting the successful missions to distant locations, the populace becomes excited about the prospects of the empire
Make Trade Not War Profitable Cessation of Hostile Actions Complex trade supply-chains are much more lucrative and successful when they can avoid capitalizing high risk premiums into their transaction costs due to a reduced threat of wartime disruption
